page.title: 01FORRES WEST
page.content: This area lies close to the {Moray {Firth}and is a low-lying area which slopes gently downwards from South to North .Most of the area is {farmland} as the soils are very fertile.The { {River Findhorn},one of the main rivers in NE Scotland,flows north-eastwards through the block.Most of the town of{ {Forres} lies in the south-east corner of the block.The main road and railway line linking Aberdeen and Inverness also run through the block.Forres was originally the main market town of the area.It is still an important { {shopping-centre}for the surrounding area and during the summer is particularly important for{tourism} .Most of the industry in the area is concerned with {agriculture}.
